post:
## Who is USSHosting

USSHosting is a subsidiary brand of Winter Hill Solutions. We provide hosting services that include Shared Hosting powered by cPanel, KVM VPS hosting powered by SolusVM. When it comes to VPS hosting we offer two flavors managed and unmanaged. Finally, we offer dedicated servers, once again, managed and unmanaged.

We pride ourselves in providing prompt and professional support. Working our most diligent to solve your issues as expediently as possible.

Have a question?: Drop us a message to [sales[at]usshosting.com](mailto:sales@usshositng.com) and one of our Deck Officers will be most obliged to help!

We are running a salute to high storage, high ram, and high bandwidth.

**High Storage** starting at $4.95 / mo.

**High RAM and Badwidth** starting at $4.95 / mo.

## The Offer

### High Storage 1
- 250 GB Storage
- 512 MB RAM
- 1.5 TB Bandwidth
- 1 IP Address
#### Price: $4.95/mo
#### [Order Now](http://portal.usshosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=27)

*High storage plans are exempt from our off site backups.

### High Storage 2
- 500 GB Storage
- 768 MB RAM
- 3 TB Bandwidth 
- 1 IP Address
#### $7/mo
#### [Order Now](http://portal.usshosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=28)

*High storage plans are exempt from our off site backups.

### High RAM and BW 1
- 50 GB Storage
- 4 GB RAM
- 50 TB Bandwidth
- 1 IP Address
- Bandwidth @ 50 MBPS port speed
#### $4.95/mo
#### [Order Now](http://portal.usshosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=29)

### High RAM and BW 2
- 100 GB Storage
- 8 GB RAM
- 50 TB Bandwidth
- 1 IP Address
- Bandwidth @ 75 MBPS port speed## Who is USSHosting

## Frequently Asked Questions

#### What are the speeds like?

Here are a few speed test results for our server in Beauharnois:

	Download speed from CacheFly: 90.0MB/s
	Download speed from Coloat, Atlanta GA: 41.4MB/s
	Download speed from Softlayer, Dallas, TX: 39.2MB/s
	Download speed from Softlayer, Seattle, WA: 18.8MB/s
	Download speed from Softlayer, San Jose, CA: 22.4MB/s
	Download speed from Softlayer, Washington, DC: 42.2MB/s
But don't take our word for it. Go head to test it out for yourself!

Beauharnois, QC, Canada: 192.99.100.112

#### Where are your servers located?

Our VPS are based out of Dallas, Texas. Additional locations can be requested and will be added.

#### Do you provide refunds?

Yes, you are eligible for a refund if you cancel and request it during the first 30 days.

#### What kind of software is not allowed?

We do not allow virtual currency mining, gaming servers, or IRC servers to be run on our VPS. Please note, however, that this is not an exhaustive list and that you should check our [Terms of Service](http://usshosting.com/TermsOfService.php) or [contact us via email](mailto:sales@usshosting.com) if you have any questions about what is allowed.

### Contact Us

Email: [sales[at]usshosting.com](mailto:sales@usshositng.com)
| Twitter: [Follow Us](http://www.twitter.com/USSHosting)
